English.Text: The crew realise they are blessed! "If God has seen fit to place us here, we should trust in him," says the ship's holy man thoughtfully, "I would not discount that this very berg has sentience! I know of at least one explorer whose expeditions ride their backs by design!" Indeed, the navigators observe that the iceberg is itself moving, and at fair speed, in a desirable direction. This shall make a fine home for a time.
